title: 03/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lakers, Giants, Patriots
itunes:title: 03/22/2021 - HOUR 1 - Lakers, Giants, Patriots
description:
The Lakers need a third star because of injuries to LeBron and AD

QB Daniel Jones needs to get the Giants to the playoffs this season or else

The Patriots might move up in the draft to get a QB

Jon Gruden's contract is looking like a problem


Guest: Albert Breer

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
